creator: alex@owal.co.uk
text:
I think the 404 page is rather unhelpful for beginners. We could improve it to
make the default publication more easy to understand. 

eg looking at this page in the default publication
http://lenya.owal.co.uk/default/authoring/links.html
and I click on the "live" button I get this page
http://lenya.owal.co.uk/default/live/links.html
which is in fact the 404: Page not found error with the following text. 

 The requested document '/links.html' with document-id '/links' does not exist.

I'd like to add some more text - possibly making it more intelligent

1) Check the referer field. If it contains "authoring" then print out some
helpful text like "The page you are looking for has not been published yet, you
need to go through the "publish" workflow process before you can see this page
on the live site.

2) Add in a tip to where you can edit this error message page. 

This is of course just for the default publication to aid in training new users.

Now one gets instead of an error 404:

An error occured.
Please contact your system administrator.

Still room for improvement...
